::BLINDHAOS, DOMNIJOE AND HOOK::


    Domnijoe stands poised beside her Decepticon comrads in case their 
confrontation became worse. She scowled and her arm began to hover in 
the 'ready' position until the confrontationalists left. As they 
departed she watched them go, wary and alert.

    Blindchaos also stood ready. He and Domnijoe had worked as a team 
for a long, long time and he wouldn't abandon her (or Firestrike!!). 
He remained ready in his dinosaur pose, tail ready for action.
*****************

Long Haul watched the entire situation with a weary eye yet he was 
eager for battle. He was weary of not being in combat. He was weary of 
always repairing people. He grunted as he rushed to Hook's side to 
attend to his wound. He faithfully attended his brother until Havotron 
ordered them back to the ship.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

*************************
